description:
After Yugi defeats Haga’s first wave of Duel Monsters, he’s shocked to discover that Haga has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!  Can Yugi find a way to destroy this winged beast before it destroys him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 究極完全態・グレート・モス
